items.sentence: Tom hurried home with gifts for his children.
Tom is doing the same thing we did yesterday.
Apparently, Tom didn't do anything yesterday.
Take your shoes off before entering a temple.
Everyone deserves good things, including you.
Tom speaks French at least as well as you do.
What kind of feedback have you gotten so far?
The trains were too crowded for us to get on.
There is insufficient light to take pictures.
The scenery was beautiful beyond description.
